title: Next Generation Operation
content: From a set A, produce all x · y − 1 for distinct x, y ∈ A. This is the core multiplication-minus-one operation that builds the sequence.

title: Full Generated Set
content: The union ⋃_n A_n of all iterates starting from {2, 3}. This is the set whose density we wish to determine.

title: Erdős Problem #424
content: Does the generated set have positive lower density? That is, is lim inf |S ∩ [1,N]|/N > 0?

title: Mod 3 Obstruction
content: No element of the generated set is ≡ 1 (mod 3). Since 2 ≡ 2 and 3 ≡ 0 (mod 3), products minus 1 always land in {0, 2} (mod 3).

title: Density Upper Bound 2/3
content: Since one residue class (mod 3) is excluded, the density is at most 2/3. This corrects an early version of the problem that asked about density 1.

title: Closure Property
content: The generated set is closed under (x, y) ↦ xy − 1 for distinct elements. Once an element enters, all its products-minus-1 with existing elements also enter.
